name: Technomancy (Synthrals only)
desc: Instinctual magic integrated with machines; “felt in the bones” of the practitioner.

name: Sync with Device
desc: Link to device sensors. Roll 1d20 + Mental vs TN12 to detect info remotely. Lasts 1 turn.

name: Build Device
desc: Creates a usable device from materials. Lasts 1 scene. Can store a single weave effect; roll 1d20 + Mental to activate.

name: Laser
desc: Deals 6 + Mental damage to target within line of sight. TN12 to hit. Range: 15 meters.

name: Hack Computer
desc: Access info on a device. Roll 1d20 + Mental vs device defense (10 + modifier). Success = full access.

name: Speak to Machinery
desc: Communicate with a device. Device answers 3 questions before effect fades. Mental roll not opposed.

name: Enchantment
desc: Unlock School of Enchantment

name: Enchant Item
desc: Embed a spell function into an item. 5 charges max; effect disappears after expended. Requires casting Mental roll 1d20 + Mental vs TN12 to apply.

name: Enchant Creature
desc: Target gains spell function for 2 turns. Mental roll vs target Mental Defense (10 + mod).

name: Enhance Creature: Strength
desc: +2 Strength rolls for 2 turns. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Enhance Creature: Speed
desc: +2 Dexterity rolls for 2 turns. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Enhance Creature: Mind
desc: +2 Mental rolls for 2 turns. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Enhance Creature: Endurance
desc: +2 Endurance rolls for 2 turns. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Effect Creature: Sleep
desc: Target sleeps for 2 turns. Roll Mental vs Mental Defense to resist. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Enhance Item: Element
desc: Adds element to item (fire, ice, etc.). Requires Create Element and Enchant Item.

name: Enchant Item: Recall
desc: Returns item to caster automatically. 3 charges. Requires Enchant Item.

name: Enchant Item: Light
desc: Object glows for 6 turns or until dismissed. Requires Create Barrier and Enchant Item.

name: Enchant Item: Storage
desc: Pocket-space container. Up to 3 small items. Requires Enchant Item.

name: Effect Creature: Bind
desc: Restrict movement 1–2 turns. Mental roll vs Mental Defense to resist. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Effect Creature: Confuse
desc: Misjudge actions for 2 turns. Mental vs Mental Defense. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Effect Creature: Silence
desc: Target cannot speak or cast vocal spells for 2 turns. Mental vs Mental Defense. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Effect Creature: Hex
desc: Reduce one stat by 2 for 2 turns. Mental vs Mental Defense. Requires Enchant Creature.

name: Enhance Item: Flight
desc: Item levitates/glides 5 turns. Requires Enchant Item.

name: Enhance Item: Echo
desc: Records one sound, replayable once. Requires Enchant Item.

name: Enhance Item: Link
desc: Link two items for synchronized effect. Requires Enchant Item.

name: Enhance Item: Illusion
desc: Shifting appearance for 5 turns or until dispelled. Requires Enchant Item.

name: Permanence
desc: Makes an enchantment permanent. Must be applied at creation with another weave.

name: Conjuration
desc: Unlock School of Conjuration.

name: Conjure Weapon
desc: Summons weapon to hand. Lasts 3 turns. Mental vs TN12 to conjure.

name: Conjure Armor
desc: +2 Defense rolls for 2 turns. Mental vs TN12 to cast.

name: Conjure Familiar
desc: Minor spirit/drone assists, granting +1 to one stat for 3 turns. Mental vs TN12 to summon.

name: Conjure Clone (Illusory)
desc: Illusory duplicate lasts 1 scene. Next attack against caster hits clone first, dissipating it.

name: Conjure Gateway
desc: Teleport portal, up to 3 creatures, vanishes after 1 turn. Mental vs TN12 to open.

name: Conjure Swarm
desc: Summon cloud of minor entities. Enemies in area take –1 to physical/mental rolls for 2 turns. Mental vs TN12 to cast.

name: Necromancy
desc: Unlock School of Necromancy

name: Animate Corpse
desc: Corpse follows commands. Lasts 1 scene. Mental roll vs TN12 to animate.

name: Raise Spirit
desc: Summon spirit. Lasts 1 scene. Mental roll vs TN12.

name: Drain
desc: Deals 6 + Mental to target, restoring same to caster. Mental vs TN12.

name: Inflict Pain
desc: Deals 4 + Mental damage. Mental vs TN12.

name: Empower Corpse/Spirit
desc: Apply another weave to raised undead. Mental roll vs TN12 to succeed.

name: Heal
desc: Restores 6 HP. Mental vs TN12.

name: Evocation
desc: Unlock School of Evocation

name: Create Element (Minor)
desc: 6 damage + Mental to target, or create small effect (fire, ice, lightning, wind, water, earth). TN12.

name: Create Element (Major)
desc: 8 damage + Mental or medium-sized effect. TN12.

name: Shape Element (Minor)
desc: Shape small elemental effect into ball, cone, ring, etc. Mental roll TN12 to shape.

name: Shape Element (Major)
desc: Shape moderate effect or elemental construct. Mental roll TN12.

name: Abjuration
desc: Unlock School of Abjuration

name: Create Barrier (Minor)
desc: Shield field, reduces damage by 2 for 2 turns. Mental vs TN12.

name: Absorb
desc: Absorb magical/elemental energy, store briefly to release. Mental vs TN12.

name: Seal
desc: Lock or suppress object, area, or entity. Mental vs TN12. Lasts until broken.

name: Dispel
desc: Remove ongoing magical effects. Mental vs TN12.

name: Damage
desc: Deals minor magical damage 6 + Mental. TN12.

name: Divination
desc: Unlock School of Divination

name: Veilglimpse
desc: Brief, fragmented vision of an immediate event about to occur (symbolic or cryptic).

name: Thread-Sense
desc: Feel the “tug” of fate around a person, place, or object; sense its importance or danger.

name: Echo of What-Isn’t
desc: Summon images of past events into the present; level of detail varies by roll.

name: Beast-Speaking
desc: Communicate with any animal or beast natural or unnatural as long as it has the capability of speech, including Spliced in shifted form.

name: Whisper Beyond
desc: The voices of the veil and the hum of the ship whisper the meaning of any unknown languages the caster hears or reads for one scene.

name: Moment Fracture
desc: Time splinters for a second; you act with foresight (dodge, or act first once). Gain a +2 Modifier to TN’s in your favor, versus attacks against you, or gain initiative, for the following turn.

name: Shard of Truth
desc: See through one deception, glamour, or hidden layer of reality for the remainder of the scene.

name: Omenmark
desc: Place a sigil that pulses through the firmament of the veil allowing the caster to divine its location at all times.

name: Fate Ripple
desc: Divine the ill intent of others as well as sensing tainted or poisoned food or drink.
